title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-1280 Linux Kernel Vulnerability

titles: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-1280 Linux Kernel Vulnerability

sentences: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a use-after-free flaw in the drm_lease_held function in drivers/gpu/drm/drm_lease.c. By sending a specially crafted request, a locally authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition or obtain sensitive information.

Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a use-after-free flaw in the drm_lease_held function in drivers/gpu/drm/drm_lease.c. By sending a specially crafted request, a locally authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service condition or obtain sensitive information.
